About the Company: Compucom Software Limited (CSL) is the leading software and education company.Compucom offers quality services in Software Development, Software Consultancy, Software Products, Web development & design, Internet/Intranet, E-Governance, Networking Solutions, round the clock maintenance (7 x 24), Technical support, BPO, Education and IT training. .The company also engagged in the business of Treasury, Software Services, Learning Solutions, Wind Power Generation.
